summary: A wrapper that loads a torchvision classification model and rewrites its final classification head. It can either replace only the last fully‑connected layer or remove the existing pooling and head and insert a new pooling layer followed by either a fully‑connected or convolutional layer, using configurable layer names and optional pretrained weights.
business_intent: Facilitate rapid adaptation of pretrained torchvision models to new classification problems by providing a flexible interface for head replacement and pooling customization, supporting both standard fine‑tuning and more advanced convolutional head designs.
